entities.description: The count of responses without applying any weights.
The percentage of responses relative to the total count.
The code associated with each specific survey response.
The count and percentage of missing data responses.
The count of valid cases used in the analysis.
The total number of cases included in the survey.
Statistical properties of the data such as mean, median, mode, minimum, and maximum.

relationships.description: Links a survey response to its unweighted frequency count.
Links a survey response to its percentage of the total responses.
Assigns a unique code to each response in the survey.
Indicates the amount of missing data in the survey.
Denotes the number of valid responses in the survey.
Indicates the total number of cases considered in the survey.
Links the survey data to its summary statistics like mean, median, mode, minimum, and maximum.
